<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Acrobat Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6240) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=572" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 183 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Acrobat](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=236)

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34)

</column>

---

You become an expert in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34). At 7th level, you become a master in Acrobatics, and at 15th level, you become legendary in Acrobatics. Whenever you critically succeed at an Acrobatics check to [Tumble Through](/Actions.aspx?ID=2370) an enemy's space, you don't treat the enemy's space as difficult terrain.

<title level="2">Acrobat Dedication leads to...</title>
[Contortionist](/Feats.aspx?ID=6241), [Costume Change](/Feats.aspx?ID=7640), [Dodge Away](/Feats.aspx?ID=6242), [Fight Choreography](/Feats.aspx?ID=7644), [Fit for the Role](/Feats.aspx?ID=7641), [Graceful Leaper](/Feats.aspx?ID=6243), [More Real than Real](/Feats.aspx?ID=7646), [Operatic Adventurer](/Feats.aspx?ID=7635), [Tragic Lament](/Feats.aspx?ID=7645), [Tumbling Opportunist](/Feats.aspx?ID=6245), [Tumbling Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=6244), [Virtuosic Dancer](/Feats.aspx?ID=7639)
name: Acrobat Dedication
